instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A2251 820-01949-07 sometimes wont charge / power on
threads.message:
Hi,

I have an A2251 820-01949-07 that some times don't charge, and don't power on. 
When this happends, It puls 19.9V from ampeter, but only consumes around 70mA. If i keep conecting and disconecting the power cable for a few times, it powers on and charges the battery.
This happens on all charging ports.

Don't know where to start. Can you help?

threads.title: A2251 820-01949-07 sometimes wont charge / power on
threads.message:
When battery has some charge, does the board turn on pressing power button?
Try w/ and w/o battery connected.
Charger alone, w/o battery, USB-C ports switch to 20V?

threads.title: A2251 820-01949-07 sometimes wont charge / power on
threads.message:
Hi, tks for the reply.
When it has battery, it turns on normally, but some times it won't charge.
With just the board I get the 20V on all ports, but sometimes I only consumes 0.70A and won't power on.
This behavior is the same with all parts mounted (including battery), and with just the board on the bench.

threads.title: A2251 820-01949-07 sometimes wont charge / power on
threads.message:
Tried known good battery?
Be sure battery data cable makes good contacts.

Just in case, try DFU revive.
If no important data, may try restore also.
